  • Method Details

    • game

      public void game(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene endGameScene, javafx.scene.Group endGameRoot, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Set the game scene, add all the cells on.
      Parameters:
      gameScene - contains the basic parameters in game scene, like background color.
      root - the game scene root.
      primaryStage - set the game scene as the primary stage.
      endGameScene - when game ended, switch to the end game scene.
      endGameRoot - the root of the game scene.
      color - the background color.
